title: 求蘑菇林种字帖！ 告诉我图标位置也可以，存档也行！
author: mayichong
txt_content: 我只想求一个蘑菇林（或者蘑菇地）的种子或者存档！

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
4
Seed 4 gets you a Mooshroom biome just off the coast.
I built a bridge.

Try the seed -133594636
You will spawn on a mushroom island =D

5765650521366642658
You spawn in water right next to a mushroom biome.

Seed: 4504911559719506496
Its just SE from spawn
But if you cant figure out which way is SE...
X: 520
Z: -470 

found a mushroom biome in my world...
coords: -1004, -4807
seed: -6421111642781786088

replies.author: mayichong
replies.txt_content: 我从1.8玩到现在都没有见过一个这样的种子......

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 蘑菇地是1.9pre几忘了才出来的 你还1.8没见过 1.8根本就没有！ 自己生成个建造存档走走去啊

replies.author: mayichong
replies.txt_content:
well 发表于 2011-11-20 08:13 
4
Seed 4 gets you a Mooshroom biome just off the coast.
I built a bridge.
thanks! by the way, why you say english?

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
mayichong 发表于 2011-11-20 09:06 
thanks! by the way, why you say english?
因為這些東西都是從英文官方論壇找來的...
